The Settlers Fra Catan: Rejseudgave
Settlers of Catan: Portable Edition
The Settlers of Catan: Travel Edition
Die Siedler von Catan: Travel Box
boardgame.description: Settlers of Catan Travel Edition is, as the name says, a Travel Edition of The Settlers of Catan. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rules of the game are the same, but there are some changes between the two editions: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No Expansions: In the Travel Edition it is not possible to add any expansions to the regular game, so it is a 3 or 4 players game only. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pre-determined Desert location: The hex containing the Desert is always in the middle of the board. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pre-determined numbers: The numbers for production are in fixed locations on the board. That is a natural follow up to the previous item. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pre-determined port location: Although the type of port at a given location may vary, the port sites themselves are in fixed locations. So the numbers for production, where a port exists, are always the same, and there is never a port near the Desert. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Snap in bits: The roads, villages and cities are all snapped into the board during game play, so it is difficult to mess with the board. The Robber, however, sits freely on the board, and, as you need somewhere to throw the dice, you may prefer a table upon which to play the Travel Edition (although the box top or box insert could be used as a dice tray)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Belongs to the Catan Series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Completely new and still in shrink wrap. All orders shipped via CanadaPost. Shipping cost in Canada is approximately $5-$10 depending on exact location. All shipping is guaranteed and tracking numbers for the shipment will be provided. Please have a look at our other listings on our website at www.starlitcitadel.com. Shipping costs is often significantly lower when purchasing more than one game. International orders, please inquire about shipping costs through email before ordering. Please provide zip code or other postal code information for exact rates that will be charged. Canadian residents should note that we are based in Richmond, BC and must by law charged PST (if you are based in BC) and GST (if you are in Canada). Feel free to e-mail if you have any other inquiries. Thank you! Tao Wong Starlit Citadel

Mayfair Games (MFG3101) Compact and portable, you can strive for the Governorship from wherever you find yourself... In fact you can play it riding on a train or flying in a plane, seated at a bar or riding in a car, afloat on an ark or in a public park, wherever your journeys shall take you, to a nearby land or afar to a distant star. This new compact and portable travel edition contains everything you need to play on the go (excepting other players of course).
